text: Franciscus Cornelis Gerardus Maria Timmermans (;In isolation, Gerardus is pronounced . born 6 May 1961) is a Dutch politician. He was the First Vice President of the European Commission from 2014 to 2019. He was also the Executive Vice President of the European Commission for the European Green Deal and European Commissioner for Climate Action from 2019 to 2023. In July 2023, Timmermans announced his plans to run for Prime Minister of the Netherlands and to run in the 2023 general election.Toby Sterling and Kate Abnett (20 July 2023), EU climate chief Timmermans to run in Dutch election Reuters. ==References== == Other websites == * Bio at Parlement.com Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy government ministers of the Netherlands Category:European Commissioners Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Ministers of foreign affairs of the Netherlands Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:Politicians from Maastricht
title: Frans Timmermans
